sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Good sir, you wrong your britches pleasantly discoursed by a witty youth, and wily wench : to the tune of Oh no, no, no, not yet, or, I'le neuer loue thee more.
1 sheet ([1] p.) : ill.
Printed for I.T., At London : [ca. 1620]
Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.). Right half of sheet contains: The Second part. To the same tune. Contains four woodcut illustrations. Reproductions of originals in: King's College (University of Cambridge). Library, and Pepysian Library, Magdalene College, University of Cambridge.
=======
